1101000010101010 0101000110110100 1 -> sum: 0010001001011111, cout: 1
1010101000001100 1111101000111100 0 -> sum: 1010010001001000, cout: 1
1011110110111001 0001010010100110 1 -> sum: 1101001001100000, cout: 0

1110010011001111 1110010110100000 1 -> sum: 1100101001110000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
